title: Shroud News - May 2008
post: FYI:At the LA Times: Shroud of Turin stirs new controversy
author: Christopher

title: Shroud News - May 2008
post: Christopher>FYI:>>At the LA Times: Shroud of Turin stirs new controversyThanks, I will be commenting on it in my August Shroud News.And also on:Shrouded in mystery, The Columbus Dispatch, August 15, 2008, Meredith Heagney.New findings reveal that the sample used to carbon-date the Shroud of Turin was not the original linen, Society and Religion, August 15, 2008.Oxford view on Shroud of Turin eagerly awaited,  Irish Times, August 7, 2008, William Reville.I am going to start adding news articles on the Shroud as they appear to a Shroud News post for that month, without waiting for the end of that month. So I should post my comments on the above articles in the next day or two. Stephen E. Jones
author: Stephen E. Jones
